text: felemma fesale talutu bilcunudi kale inne-llahe mubtelikum bineher. femen seribe minhu feleyse minni. vemel lem yat`amhu feinnehu minni illa meni-gterafe gurfetem biyedih. feseribu minhu illa kalilem minhum. felemma cavezehu huve vellezine amenu me`ahu kalu la takate lene-lyevme bicalute vecunudih. kale-llezine yezunnune ennehum mulaku-llahi kem min fietin kaliletin galebet fieten kesiratem biizni-llah. vellahu me`a-ssabirin
